abstract: General Motors and Suzuki Motor have agreed to end their automaking joint venture in Canada, leaving G.M. without a Japanese production partner after also severing manufacturing links with Toyota.
snippet: General Motors and Suzuki Motor have agreed to end their automaking joint venture in Canada, leaving G.M. without a Japanese production partner after also severing manufacturing links with Toyota.
lead_paragraph: General Motors and Suzuki Motor have agreed to end their automaking joint venture in Canada, leaving G.M. without a Japanese production partner after also severing manufacturing links with Toyota.

headline.main: Suzuki and G.M. End Canada Partnership
